# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Creates an atomic group with the given regex component.

## Declaration

```swift
init<W, C1, C2, C3>(_ component: some RegexComponent) where Output == (Substring, C1, C2, C3)
```

## Parameters

- **component**: The regex component to wrap in an atomic group.
title: init(_:)
